item.title: Adding a progress bar to your Python script
item.description: The problem? You’re writing a Python script which carries out some tasks in a loop. Maybe you’re processing data in a bunch of files, or scraping a list of websites. Whatever it is, the task takes anything from a few seconds to a few minutes to complete. Wouldn’t it be great if you could visualise progress (in the command line no less!) easily, and without some ugly print() statements in your code?
